p:
Relative ion leakage was determined as reported.
58 The fresh leaf sample (0.5 g) and 10 mL of deionized water were kept in a petri dish at 25 °C for 2 h. The first conductivity of the bathing solution was tested after incubation ( C 1). The second conductivity was determined after boiling the bathing solution continuously for 15 min ( C 2). The relative ion leakage was calculated as: C 1/ C 2 × 100.
